info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 7:33PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Abbeville County through 830 PM EDT... At 733 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles south of Anderson, or near Iva, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Due West, Lake Secession and Antreville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
